data.text:
Poor Things

Play trailer

Yorgos Lanthimos / US, IE, GB, 2023 / 141 min.

Yorgos Lanthimos’ latest, once again featuring Emma Stone, is a ‘feminist version of Mary Shelley’s Frankenstein’. Bella Baxter who died young is brought back to life by a brilliant scientist and then sets off to explore the world.

It sounds too crazy to be true: the beautiful, young, talented Bella (Emma Stone) drowns and the brilliant scientist Godwin Baxter (Willem Dafoe) brings Bella back to life by implanting her unborn baby’s brain into her skull.
